subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Paired against the Celtics’ Rajon Rondo, the rookie Derrick Rose scored a career-high 36 points and led the Bulls to victory in Game 1 of their first-round playoff series.
snippet: Paired against the Celtics’ Rajon Rondo, the rookie Derrick Rose scored a career-high 36 points and led the Bulls to victory in Game 1 of their first-round playoff series.
